phrs.translation: 杀出重围, 杀出重围陨落, 骇客任务, 隐形战争
天外救星, 解围的人或事件, 机器大帝, 机械降神
上帝之城, 无主之城, 天主之城, 无法无天
斯特拉的众神, 星之魔咒, 斯特拉众神, 星空夜语
十字军诸王记神的旨意

sentences.sentence: Last year the police took control of Cidade DE deus-this time for keeps, they say.
sentences.translation: 去年警方掌控了“上帝之城”—这一次持续掌控，他们表示。

sentences.sentence: Monnet had chosen america as the deus ex machina that would propel europe toward unity .
sentences.translation: 莫内选中美国来充当推动欧洲联合的鬼使神差。

sentences.sentence: Mr Carville, known for his witty tongue and take-no-prisoners style, would have been happy to play the role of a Deus ex machina.
sentences.translation: 以其机智诙谐的语言和锐意进取的风格，Carville先生有可能会乐于扮演救世主的角色。
